Text: this is a good movie and its worth 2 be called dvdrip.its a must watch movie

Thanks for the film,was a bit dissapointed though as  this is a different version from what i watched when i was a kid.Loads of scenes cut out and has'nt got the original music(stand on your own) when he's training.Gonna try and find the original one i watched.
This movie was my favourite back in the day i was a kid. It means so much to be and brings back memories, thank you so much, this cant be forgotten :)
